backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with types and maps for users, videos, comments, playlists, AI features, and includes image-saving logic with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence for updates removing keyword-based AI content blocks and adjusting related UI and utility files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of major frontend files covering navigation, pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, auth, page state, payment callbacks, and rendering core pages inside AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AddToPlaylistDia: Modal dialog allowing users to add a video to existing playlists or create new ones, with auth checks and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/Images: Manages AI image generation, uploading, promo editing, and saved image library interactions within tabbed views.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/PromoC: Offers a canvas-based promo editor allowing text overlays, erasing, downloading, and saving composed images.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/SavedI: Shows saved promo images with metadata, supports reopening images for editing, and allows deletion.
frontend/src/components/AiEditDialog.tsx: Dialog UI that displays AI-generated title, description, and tag suggestions and lets users apply them individually or all at once.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, sidebar, footer, and main content region with navigation handlers.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Handles displaying, adding, deleting, and pinning comments with auth, subscription checks, and moderation controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding, a caffeine.ai link, and optional navigation to YouTubeMe.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with login/logout via Internet Identity, search handling, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/InternetIdentity: Modal explaining Internet Identity signâ€‘in and providing a continue/cancel flow before login.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to enter their name and save an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a navigational sidebar showing various pages based on authentication and subscription state, with responsive mobile behavior.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Provides an admin-only modal for configuring Stripe keys and allowed countries, followed by payout destination setup.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video thumbnail card with title, uploader, views, likes, and tags, and handles video and channel click events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading and managing user identities and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, AI stats, payments, chat messages, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Applies Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AiChatRoomPage.tsx: Implements a real-time AI chat room UI with message sending, authentication checks, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentCa: Shows a cancellation notice for AI Studio payments with navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentSu: Verifies payment success, handles errors, and displays activated AI Studio features.
frontend/src/pages/AiStudioPage.tsx: AI video and image generation page handling user auth, generation limits, and creation workflow with background images and resolution settings.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a user's channel, videos, and allows creating or editing channel details if owned by the viewer.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Authenticated creator dashboard for viewing, managing, and editing the user's uploaded videos.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to AI Studio, AI chat room, and an external YouTube-like interface.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentFailur: Shows a cancelled payment message with options to return to the video or home.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentSucces: Verifies a completed payment and grants download access, displaying success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Fetches and displays videos with search support, loading states, and links to AI tools. Sorts videos by date and renders cards or empty-state messages.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment-cancelled message with options to return home or retry checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies a Stripe session, updates subscription status, and displays success or error states. Handles loading and error messaging during verification.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistDetailPage.ts: Loads a playlist and its videos, showing loading, empty, or populated states with navigation. Filters all videos to only those in the playlist.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistsPage.tsx: Displays and manages user playlists with creation dialog, authentication checks, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Shows subscription options, verifies Stripe config, and initiates checkout for premium access.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Video upload page handling file selection, trimming, metadata entry, and submission with progress and AI prefill support.
frontend/src/pages/VideoEditPage.tsx: Video metadata editor allowing title, description, tags, and thumbnail updates with optional AI-based suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Video playback page with views, likes, comments, purchase flow, and download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeMePage.tsx: Static informational page explaining YouTubeMe.xyz features and integration with metube.xyz.
frontend/src/utils/aiEditHeuristics.ts: Local heuristics for improving titles, descriptions, and tags by formatting text and extracting keywords.
frontend/src/utils/aiImageGenerator.ts: Client-side deterministic image generator using canvas with multiple styles and simulated progress.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoGenerator.ts: Generates a client-side WebM video using Canvas and MediaRecorder with resolution caps and fallback logic, rendering text and optional background images. Returns a File, preview URL, and metadata.
frontend/src/utils/canvasExport.ts: Provides helpers to export canvases as PNG files, data URLs, blob URLs, and load images from File objects.
frontend/src/utils/contentPolicy.ts: Implements minimal local content policy checks, always allowing text but returning generic guideline messages.
frontend/src/utils/fetchImageFromUrl.ts: Fetches and validates remote images via CORS with URL checks, content-type validation, and image decoding before returning a FetchedImage.
frontend/src/utils/networkGuards.ts: Defines local-only network guard stubs that log operations and allow validation of no external API calls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Stores project state, scope decisions, architectural notes, and existing feature definitions for MeTube/MeTube AI Studios.
